message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. This is a good start, but we can negotiate further.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor. Take this offer before inflation eats away at the pie.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway on your last offer. Let's split it 45/55 in my favor. It's a better deal than your proposal and still leaves you with a significant portion.
